'''Radiant Spincrystal 121''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Guhua's Legacy]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located in [[Wangshan Hall, Secret Chamber]] after completing the {{Quest|Scrolls and Sword Manuals of Guhua}}.

Once redeemed, it appears under the name "Past Glories of Wangshan" in the [[Realm Music]] interface, instead of using the soundtrack's officially released title.
